channel.title: Steps to becoming a Gauntlet GM
channel.description:
Hi everyone!
I was fortunate enough to be able to play in 3 sessions of games in April as a newly active member.
* [Murderous Ghosts](https://gauntlet-hangouts.firebaseapp.com/event-detail/-MVmV8V-Z2s9bRQ_qbrM) (a PtbA game) * [Playdate: Let's Play](https://gauntlet-hangouts.firebaseapp.com/event-detail/-MXdG09c-qvxXYMbtFnq) (a GxB hack) * [Season of Dreams](https://gauntlet-hangouts.firebaseapp.com/event-detail/-MSYrGkm1lATXXnAFnuE) (a PtbA game)
I was quite tight-lipped in the beginning as a non-native speaker, but gradually opened up. My last game, Season of Dreams 3. was one of my best English roleplaying experience (I play online since 2010 if I remember correctly)
I guess this three occasion were not enough to really know me and vouch for me, but I hope that my GMs (@SinisterBeard @EpistolaryRichard @BlakeRyan ) and other fellow players can confirm that I am an okay person :)
What are the next steps to become a Gauntlet GM and run one shots?
